statements: DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE call_id = 1001 AND caller_number = '5551234567';
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE call_type = 'incoming' AND call_duration > 300;
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE caller_number = '5559876543' AND call_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE caller_id = 100 AND receiver_id = 200;
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_behavior WHERE call_frequency < 5);
DELETE FROM call_logs WHERE call_duration > 600 AND call_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND customer_phone_number LIKE '+1%';
DELETE FROM CallPatterns WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe') AND call_type = 'missed' AND call_frequency < 5;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND email = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_date < '2022-01-01' AND behavior_description LIKE '%complaint%';
DELETE FROM customer WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
